definitions: a person, device, or computer program that examines something methodically and in detail

examples.text: the built-in analyzer will rate the relevance of search results against the input phrase
the ancient Greeks were brilliant analyzers of the physical world

shortDefinitions: person or program that examines something methodically

definitions: a device that identifies and measures the chemical constituents of a substance or specimen
shortDefinitions: device that identifies and measures chemical constituents
